lockHRC1155Token(address,uint256,address.details: lock tokens to be minted on harmony chain

params.data: additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.recipient: recipient address on the harmony chain
params.tokenId: tokenId of the token to lock

lockHRC1155Tokens(address,uint256[],addr.details: lock tokens to be minted on harmony chain

params.data: additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.recipient: recipient address on the harmony chain
params.tokenIds: tokenIds of the token to lock

unlockHRC1155Token(address,uint256,addre.details: unlock tokens after burning them on harmony chain

params.data: additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.recipient: recipient address on the harmony chain
params.tokenId: tokenId of the token to lock

unlockHRC1155Tokens(address,uint256[],ad.details: unlock tokens after burning them on harmony chain

params.data: additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.receiptId: transaction hash of the burn event on harmony chain
params.tokenIds: tokenIds of the token to unlock
